Title: WPF Turn-based Strategy Wargame
Description: This is a project to create a turn-based strategy game using the Windows Presentation Foundation.  The technological foundations of the software allow new game maps to be easily stipulated in XAML, theoretically enabling support for multiple games.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This is a project to create a turn-based strategy game using the Windows Presentation Foundation. The technological foundations of the software allow new game maps to be easily stipulated in XAML, theoretically enabling support for multiple games.
